articles.title: Argentina exchange warns more wheat cuts likely as yields disappoint
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Dec 1 (Reuters) - Argentina's wheat production outlook is likely to face more cuts due to lower-than-expected yields, the Buenos Aires grains exchange said on Thursday, as the harvest of the grains advances in the midst of a prolonged drought.In a weekly crop report, the exchange said 2022/23 wheat production, which it current estimates at 12.4 million tonnes, is

articles.title: Argentina mom allegedly put dead girl in concrete block
articles.description: Vanesa Mansilla allegedly placed the body of her 5-year-old girl inside a wooden box, filled it with cement and used it as a bedside table for several months.
articles.content:
A 27-year-old Argentinian woman allegedly placed the body of her 5-year-old girl inside a wooden box, filled it with cement and used it as a bedside table for several months.
